concept.title: How Impala Works with Hadoop File Formats

conbody.p: file formats compression Impala supports several familiar file formats used in Apache Hadoop. Impala can load and query data files produced by other Hadoop components such as Pig or MapReduce, and data files produced by Impala can be used by other components also. The following sections discuss the procedures, limitations, and performance considerations for using each file format with Impala.
